sentence: Spa and sauna closed for one month for refurb
Gone has Macka Josephat Raj and Anand only to be replaced by agency staff who have no idea of rapport and courtesy with the paying customer spa member
Regard Ian Crookes spar member and frequent bar customers

I stayed for 2nights it was terrible and noisy you we could not sleep or pray or enjoy the beach they have party it was very loud and they closed the beach it was not relaxing and the hotel is very old and not comfortable added to that I told them it is our anniversary but they ignore it and do nothing also the spa for men was on maintaining and we could not enjoy it

After three consecutive stays On the pros definitely excellent location near the airportNice polNice gym but smalNot so bad for the breakfast bufetVery good room diningOn the consRoms are teribleAc is too noisyBad noise insulation so you can hear your neighborsNot possible to have a shower without spilling water all over the placeWeak on room amneties with respect to similar hotelsDirty moqueteUnclean closetsVery old electrical installations with wall sockets not working and no remote switches no speaker in the bathroom no programable wake up call etc

Room keeping not good as they did not change the bed sheet every day Internet expensive breakfast buffet everyday the same treadmill machines in the gym are not suitable for tall guys as the built in TV screen not adjustable
Tennis court needs repair
Given a room with no view at rear of hotel which was surrounded by kids on some sports convention who were all running round the corridors
I booked the Swedish massage at the Doha Mariot spa
The only thing maybe to improve might be the upkeep of the mens spa during rush hour as by the afternoon all amenities juices etc
From the front desk to room service to the spa the attentiveness and genuine care is excellent
I loved the gym and the friendly staff just adds to the ambience of the place
I still gave it a 3 star because the ambiance was good the Jacuzi and sauna was great however the service itself was disappointing
Good fodsteam and sauna were out of order
This Mariot has a good gym and an outdoor pool
The hotel has everything on its inventory from small beach to swimming pool and spa to massage services
All staff could not be more helpful and friendly check in concierge corniche restaurant the polside and spa staff are all amazing
The gym is well equipped and attached to a spa which has nice steam rooms and a cold plunge pool
We also enjoyed the spa facilities
Wounderful Hotel spical Mrs Nanna and Mrs Hanan from healthy clup Spa are so friendly and very professional in the hospitality
